name: CATsteroid (miko23)
description:
Overview

Play as a cat astronaut and survive incoming asteroids.
From a top down view, players can see power ups dropped by destroying incoming asteroids that would potentially collide with them. Watch out though, some asteroids cannot be destroyed and need to be avoided at all costs.

Controls

W – Move Forward

S – Move Backward

A –Rotate Left

D – Rotate Right

Spacebar – Shoot

Features PowerUps

Left icon is a Shield, granting player a temporary shield

Middle icon is a Spread shot, granting players to shoot 3 shots at a time in a spread 

Right icon is Increase movement, granting players to move faster for a while.

Challenge

A red tinted asteroid cannot be destroyed, therefore, players must avoid it entirely as it passes by
